definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: I suppose your wife is all right, " he said hesitatingly ."
sentences.chinese: 我想弟婦也總很好，”他躇躊着說道。

sentences.english: My sister-in-law and her church friend accompanied me to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 弟婦和她的教會朋友陪同我到醫院。

sentences.english: His brother and wife were on the way to Da Lan Island to look for Dr Uehara Sora to perform a surgery.
sentences.chinese: 弟弟和弟婦正前往大蘭島找上原空醫生動手術。
